sentence: Im really glad they invented shampoo. imagine having to wash your hair with real poo?
explanation: A shampoo is a hair product that is used to clean and care for hair.
first_new_sentence: I applied shampoo to my hair to make it clean and shiny.
second_new_sentence: The shampoo I bought has a pleasant fragrance that lingers all day.

sentence: This joke uses the word shampoo in two contexts: as a cleaning product for hair and the humorous play on the word poo which sounds similar but refers to excrement.
